refnamediv.refpurpose: Wrapper around g++ to create more portable apps

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: This manual page documents briefly the &package; command.
&package; is a wrapper around ligcc. It allows you to create more portable executables, see the ligcc manual page for more information.

refsect1.title: Options
refsect1.para: See the manpage of g++(1) for more information about possible options.
There are also several environment variables available to modify lig++'s behavior check the documentation for more information.

refsect1.title: See Also
refsect1.para: Additional documentation can be found on http://people.freedesktop.org/~mak/limba.
